function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate office space cleaning policies and procedures","Impact":"Increased infection risks for employees","Mitigation":"Implement enhanced cleaning and disinfection protocols","Technologies":"Advanced cleaning equipment and disinfectants","People":"Employees","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Obsolete office surveillance systems","Impact":"Ineffective monitoring of employee attendance during the pandemic","Mitigation":"Upgrade surveillance systems to enable effective monitoring","Technologies":"Advanced surveillance technology","People":"Facility management","Owner":"Technology implementation team"},{"Description":"Employees suppressing disease symptoms","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within the office","Mitigation":"Encourage employees to report symptoms and seek medical attention","Technologies":"Health monitoring and reporting systems","People":"Employees","Owner":"Human resources"}]}
